clinical_study.brief_title: A Real-world Study of Herombopag in the Treatment of Thrombocytopenia Related Diseases in Henan Province
clinical_study.official_title: A Real-world Study of Herombopag in the Treatment of Thrombocytopenia Related Diseases in Henan Province

brief_summary.textblock: To observe and evaluate the safety and effectiveness of herombopag in the treatment of thrombocytopenia-related diseases in Henan Province

detailed_description.textblock: This study is designed as a real-world study on the treatment of thrombocytopenia-related diseases with Herombopag, to observe and analyze the safety and efficacy of Herombopag for thrombocytopenia-related diseases in the real world.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of adverse events after the treatment of Herombopag
primary_outcome.time_frame: From the treatment of Herombopag to 28 days after the end of the medication
primary_outcome.description: The investigator will observe incidence of adverse events after the treatment of Herombopag, including thrombosis, diarrhea, abnormal liver function and so on.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes of the platelet counts after the treatment of Herombopag
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the treatment of Herombopag to 28 days after the end of the medication
secondary_outcome.description: The investigator will assess the changes of the platelet counts after the treatment of Herombopag。

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients with platelet transfusion
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the treatment of Herombopag to 28 days after the end of the medication
secondary_outcome.description: The investigator will assess the proportion of patients with platelet transfusion after the treatment of Herombopag。

intervention.description: Herombopag in the treatment of thrombocytopenia-related diseases Non-interventional clinical research.Do not interfere with the dosage and market of Hetrobopar Oral medication
